name: Re-admission indicator
description: User-defined table indicating that a patient is being re-admitted to the facility and the circumstances

values.definition: Patient is being re-admitted to the healthcare facility

notes: User-defined table with 'R' as commonly suggested value for readmission. Organizations may define additional local codes.

vendorVariations.epic: Uses standard 'R' code with additional organization-specific readmission categories
vendorVariations.cerner: Supports 'R' with local extensions for different types of readmissions
vendorVariations.allscripts: Standard implementation with optional workflow-specific indicators
